mapper.select:
select * ,concat(dom_sido_nm,' ',dom_sgg_nm,' ',dom_emd_nm,' ',dom_ri_nm,' ',dom_jibun) as address, dom_idx as idx, dom_dopco_no as DOPCO_NO, dom_sido_nm as SIDO_NM, dom_sgg_nm as SGG_NM, dom_emd_nm as EMD_NM, dom_ri_nm as RI_NM, dom_jibun as JIBUN, dom_addrcode as ADDRCODE, dom_jisa as JISA, dom_dopco_status as DOPCO_STATUS, TO_CHAR(dom_DEUNGGI_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DEUNGGI_DATE, dom_pnu as PNU, dom_yongdo as YONGDO, dom_pipe_name as PIPE_NAME, dom_sun_gubun as SUN_GUBUN, dom_JIJUK_AREA AS JIJUK_AREA, dom_gover_own_yn as GOVER_OWN_YN, dom_dosiplan as DOSIPLAN, dom_jasan_no as JASAN_NO, dom_comple_yn as COMPLE_YN, dom_deunggi_no as DEUNGGI_NO, dom_deunggiso as DEUNGGISO, dom_jimok_text as JIMOK_TEXT, TO_CHAR(dom_CHUIDEUK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHUIDEUK_DATE from dopco_master where 1=1
and dom_idx=cast(#{idx} as integer)
mapper.insert: Insert into DOPCO_TOJA ( dt_DOPCO_NO, dt_TOJA_NO ) Values ( #{DOPCO_NO},#{TOJA} )

Insert into DOPCO_RIGHT ( DOPCO_NO, RIGHT_NAME, RIGHT_MONEY
,RIGHT_DATE
,CANCLE_DATE
, RIGHT_UNAME, RIGHT_PHONE, RIGHT_ADDR ) Values ( #{DOPCO_NO},#{RIGHT_NAME},#{RIGHT_MONEY}
, TO_DATE(#{RIGHT_DATE}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
, TO_DATE(#{CANCLE_DATE}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
, #{RIGHT_UNAME},#{RIGHT_PHONE},#{RIGHT_ADDR} )
INSERT INTO DOPCO_ATCFILE(da_DOPCO_NO, da_SEQ , da_FILE_PATH, da_FILE_NM) VALUES (#{DOPCO_NO}, nextVal(dopco_atc_seq), #{FILE_PATH}, #{FILE_NM})
Insert into DOPCO_MODIFY ( dom_DOPCO_NO, dom_MODIFY_DATE, dom_GUBUN, dom_CONT, dom_USER_NAME, dom_USER_ID) Values (#{DOPCO_NO},Now(), #{GUBUN}, #{CONT}, #{USER_NAME}, #{USER_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(dom_DOPCO_NO FROM 3) AS INTEGER)), 0) AS NOW_DOPCONO FROM DOPCO_MASTER;
SELECT * FROM DOPCO_MODIFY WHERE DOPCO_NO = #{DOPCO_NO} ORDER BY MODIFY_DATE
